      static CPUUsage newInstance(int port) 
      void resetInterval()
      Resets the sampling interval, and returns the CPU usage for the running process since the last call to this method or since the creation of a this CPUUsage instance if, resetIntevalAndGetCpuUsage was never called before
      double resetIntervalAndGetCpuUsage()
      Resets the sampling interval, and returns the CPU usage for the running process since the last call to this method or since the creation of a this CPUUsage instance if, resetIntevalAndGetCpuUsage was never called before
